roleset.name: discharge in rapid bursts
roleset.note: VOLLEY-V NOTES: Roleset based on internet search. Added due to parallel expansion of verbnet, propbank, and sense groupings. No verbnet class. No framenet mappings. Framed by Katie. (from volley.01-v)

example.name: fire shots
example.text: Gun shots volleyed at the attackers.

example.name: fire curses
example.text: He volleyed a string of curses.

roleset.name: hit or return before it touches the ground
roleset.note: VOLLEY-V NOTES: Roleset based on internet search. Added due to parallel expansion of verbnet, propbank, and sense groupings. No verbnet class. No framenet mappings. Framed by Katie. (from volley.02-v)

example.name: concrete use
example.text: Let's volley for the first serve.

example.name: metaphorical use
example.text: Flirting pairs volley back and forth.

example.name: example with all args
example.text: The instructor volleyed the ball with her.
